about_the_game:
This volume contains tracks for the Wawsp Queen, Dream/Nightmare area, and the general ambient tracks that play in the Overworld.

Tracks:
01 - Stewart Keller - Bouncing Clouds
02 - Stewart Keller - Hovering
03 - Stewart Keller - Light Mist
04 - Stewart Keller - Twisting Bubbles
05 - Stewart Keller - Breathe
06 - Stewart Keller - Resonance
07 - Stewart Keller - Synthesis
08 - Stewart Keller - Kind Spirits
09 - Stewart Keller - Soft Ripples
10 - Stewart Keller - Aerosol
11 - Stewart Keller - Sleep Powder
12 - Stewart Keller - Dream Eater!
13 - Stewart Keller & Fishlicka - Wawsp Queen!

name: Juice Galaxy Soundtrack Volume 2
short_description: Tracks from the second phase of Juice Galaxy development, from the Wawsp Queen through the Dream Devourer!
